cards.title: The Coffee Shop
cards.sceneText: Elena's hands trembled as she held her cup. Marcus was back. After everything, he was sitting at their old table like no time had passed at all.
cards.recapText: Marcus returned to town after five years away.
cards.scene_description: A woman in her late 20s sits in a cozy coffee shop, morning light streaming through the window. She's frozen mid-sip, staring at something off-frame. Her expression shows recognition and old pain. Warm wooden interior, steam rising from her cup.

image_generation.prompt: Young woman with dark hair in a warm cafe, morning sunlight through window, holding coffee cup, expression of shock and recognition, cozy interior with wooden furniture, shallow depth of field, intimate portrait

cards.title: The Conversation
cards.sceneText: They sat across from each other, the years between them heavier than the silence. Some questions don't have good answers.
cards.recapText: Elena and Marcus finally spoke for the first time in five years.
cards.scene_description: Two people in their late 20s sitting across from each other at a small cafe table. Awkward body language, emotional tension visible. Half-empty coffee cups between them. Afternoon light creates long shadows.

image_generation.prompt: Two people at cafe table facing each other, tense body language, afternoon sunlight creating shadows, emotional conversation, intimate framing, realistic photography

cards.title: Sophie Knows
cards.sceneText: Sophie found Elena on the bench in the park where they always met. Best friends don't need explanations. They just know.
cards.recapText: Sophie realized Marcus was back before Elena could tell her.
cards.scene_description: Two women sitting on a park bench, one comforting the other. Late afternoon golden hour light filtering through trees. Supportive body language, one woman's hand on the other's shoulder. Urban park setting.
